entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight except gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Windy. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Windy. High minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 09 January 2023
